description:
Cleared-up criminal offences

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
24911 Police crime statistics

Definition:
According to the definition of police crime statistics, a
criminal offence is considered as cleared up if the police
investigation has identified at least one suspect who is
either known by name or caught in the act.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Cleared-up criminal offences
